title: AI Review Kit Skill Metadata Schema
description: Schema for the YAML frontmatter metadata of a review skill.

id.description: Unique identifier for the skill. Should remain stable across file moves or renames.

version.description: Semantic version of the skill definition (major.minor.patch).

description.description: Short description of the skill’s purpose and scope.

severity.description: Severity level of issues flagged by this skill.

phase.description: Development phases in which this skill should run.

category.description: High‑level category or ISO 25010 quality characteristic this skill relates to.

tags.description: Additional tags for filtering and semantic routing.

applyTo.description: Glob patterns indicating which files this skill applies to.

exclude.description: Glob patterns indicating which files to exclude from this skill.

events.description: Events that should trigger execution of this skill.

model.description: Recommended model identifier to use when invoking this skill (optional).

expected_output.description: Structure of the expected output from this skill.

format.description: Name of the output schema contract that this skill adheres to.

fields.description: Ordered list of fields expected in the output.

author.description: Person or team responsible for maintaining this skill (optional).
